Configuration

Source (User Mode)

In User Mode, you can migrate either a given Outlook profile, or a PST file

Outlook Profile

Choose an Outlook profile, and everything in the profile will be migrated.

PST File

Choose a PST file, and everything in that file will be migrated.

Destination

Hostname

Enter the Zimbra Hostname.

Port

Enter the port.

Use Secure Connection

Yes for HTTPS, no for HTTP.

Username

Enter the ZCS account username.

Password

Enter the password for the given user.
